price: 38. En Wij schiepen niet de hemelen en de aarde en alles wat daar tussen is voor uitsluitend spel,
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqnā al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā lāʿibīna
